p: On the basis of its ADME profile, oseltamivir shows overall good bioavailability for a drug intended for oral administration. It was previously shown that oseltamivir has an 80% bioavailability upon oral administration and a limited potential for clinically relevant interactions with commonly co-administered drugs [ 122]. Given its structure and metabolic pathway, oseltamivir does not contain known toxicophore groups or precursors.
